Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: R. Todd
Reviews.Content: It is being used in the church as a monitor. I am impressed with the quality of the pictures and will certainly purchase another one for my home. Thanks

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: William Adams
Reviews.Content: Looks great and you can't beat the price.  If you don't need all the frills of a smart tv this is for you

Reviews.Title: Great Makeup Surprise
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Purchased for girlfriend to make up with her. Came as described. Picture was excellent sound quality was great for a normal sized bedroom. All in all a great buy for amount. Thanks.

ProductInfo.Features:
TV Type: LED
Screen Size Class: 42"
Vertical Resolution: 1080p
Maximum Resolution: 1920 x 1080
Screen Refresh Rate: 60Hz
